alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 3:43PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pike and eastern Amite Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 343 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Liberty, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mccomb, Liberty, Summit and Smithdale. This includes Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 18 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southern Mississippi.
